mapper.select: SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, CALLEE_REQ_SEQ_NO AS calleeReqSeqNo, CALLEE_REQ_CHASU AS calleeReqChasu, CALLEE_REQ_GUBUN AS calleeReqGubun, CALLEE_CHASU_GUBUN AS calleeChasuGubun, CORNER_ARRIVAL_DATETIME AS cornerArrivalDatetime, ARRIVAL_CORP_CODE AS arrivalCorpCode, UNUSL AS unusl, CRT_NO AS crtNo FROM ATMS_01001140

SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, CALLEE_REQ_SEQ_NO AS calleeReqSeqNo, CALLEE_REQ_CHASU AS calleeReqChasu, CALLEE_REQ_GUBUN AS calleeReqGubun, CALLEE_CHASU_GUBUN AS calleeChasuGubun, CORNER_ARRIVAL_DATETIME AS cornerArrivalDatetime, ARRIVAL_CORP_CODE AS arrivalCorpCode, UNUSL AS unusl, CRT_NO AS crtNo FROM ATMS_01001140 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_01001140 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}

UPDATE ATMS_01001140 SET JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, CALLEE_REQ_SEQ_NO = #{calleeReqSeqNo}, CALLEE_REQ_CHASU = #{calleeReqChasu}, CALLEE_REQ_GUBUN = #{calleeReqGubun}, CALLEE_CHASU_GUBUN = #{calleeChasuGubun}, CORNER_ARRIVAL_DATETIME = #{cornerArrivalDatetime}, ARRIVAL_CORP_CODE = #{arrivalCorpCode}, UNUSL = #{unusl}, CRT_NO = #{crtNo} WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}

INSERT INTO ATMS_01001140 ( JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, TERMINAL_NO, ERROR_DATETIME, CALLEE_REQ_SEQ_NO, CALLEE_REQ_CHASU, CALLEE_REQ_GUBUN, CALLEE_CHASU_GUBUN, CORNER_ARRIVAL_DATETIME, ARRIVAL_CORP_CODE, UNUSL, CRT_NO ) VALUES ( #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{terminalNo}, #{errorDatetime}, #{calleeReqSeqNo}, #{calleeReqChasu}, #{calleeReqGubun}, #{calleeChasuGubun}, #{cornerArrivalDatetime}, #{arrivalCorpCode}, #{unusl}, #{crtNo} )
